title: Scaffold PWA: Vite + React + Tailwind Setup
Decide visual tokens source of truth
description: Single decision: Keep cyan terminal aesthetic or align to spec's gold? Update decisions.md, requirements.md, tests.md, and project-spec.md to match chosen direction.
acceptance_criteria:
- Decision logged in feature-dev-docs/feature-dev-init/decisions.md
- project-spec.md updated if needed
- requirements.md design references updated
- tests.md visual verification criteria aligned

title: Fix saved song selection to load song data
description: HIGH severity bug. SavedSongs onSelect only switches view without passing selected song. Fix App.tsx:93 to actually load the chosen song into activeSong state.
design: Modify onSelect callback to accept song parameter and call setActiveSong before view switch.
acceptance_criteria:
- Clicking saved song loads it into active view
- All sections and chords display correctly
- Test verifies song data flows through selection

title: Fix system library selection to load progression
description: HIGH severity bug. Dashboard.tsx:91 onSelect only switches view. Fix to pass selected progression and load it as active song.
design: Modify Dashboard onSelect to pass progression id/data, update App.tsx handler to load into activeSong.
acceptance_criteria:
- Clicking system library progression loads it into active view
- Chord display matches selected progression
- Test verifies progression loads correctly

title: Fix flat-key roman numeral analysis
description: HIGH severity bug. theory.ts:130 toUpperCase() converts "Bb" to "BB" breaking getNoteIndex. Fix to preserve accidental case.
design: Split key parsing to uppercase only first character, preserve accidental. Add flat key test cases.
acceptance_criteria:
- getRomanNumeral("Am", "Bb MAJOR") returns correct numeral
- All flat keys (Bb, Eb, Ab, Db, Gb) work correctly
- Unit tests cover flat key scenarios

title: Clear editingTarget on scratchpad back navigation
description: MEDIUM severity bug. App.tsx:121 back handler doesn't clear editingTarget, causing stale state on next scratchpad add.
design: Add setEditingTarget(null) to scratchpad onBack handler in App.tsx.
acceptance_criteria:
- Backing out of scratchpad clears editing state
- Next add from scratchpad appends (doesn't replace)
- Test verifies editingTarget cleared on back

title: Implement save overlay with title editing
description: Match Stitch export design for save_song_overlay. Title input, section summary display, save/cancel actions.
design: Reference: stitch-exports/stitch_chord_voicing_am9/save_song_overlay. Modal overlay with title field, section breakdown, confirm/cancel buttons.
acceptance_criteria:
- Save button opens overlay modal
- Title field editable with current song title pre-filled
- Section summary shows VERSE/CHORUS/BRIDGE with chord counts
- Save persists to localStorage with edited title
- Cancel dismisses without saving

title: Add last-opened timestamp to saved songs
description: Track when songs were last opened to enable proper sorting in library view.
acceptance_criteria:
- Song model includes lastOpened timestamp
- Loading a saved song updates lastOpened
- Library can sort by lastOpened (most recent first)

title: Wire add-to-chorus and add-to-bridge buttons
description: ArtistLibrary B and C buttons (lines 88-95) are visual-only with opacity-40. Wire them to add progressions to CHORUS and BRIDGE sections.
design: Modify onAddProgression to accept target section parameter. Update ArtistLibrary buttons to pass 'BRIDGE' or 'CHORUS' respectively.
acceptance_criteria:
- V button adds to VERSE (existing)
- B button adds to BRIDGE
- C button adds to CHORUS
- All buttons have full opacity and functional state

title: Fix edit-from-active flow to return to active view
description: Currently scratchpad onBack returns to dashboard (App.tsx:121), losing context. When editing from active view, should return to active view.
design: Track previous view or use editingTarget presence to determine return destination. If editingTarget was set, return to active view.
acceptance_criteria:
- Edit chord from active view → scratchpad → back → returns to active view
- Direct scratchpad access → back → returns to dashboard
- Navigation state preserved correctly

title: Implement library sorting and filter chips
description: SavedSongs filter/sort chips are visual-only. Wire functionality for sorting and filtering saved songs.
acceptance_criteria:
- Sort by: last opened, alphabetical, date created
- Filter by: has VERSE, has CHORUS, has BRIDGE
- Active filter state visually indicated
- Empty state shows when no matches

title: Setup Data Layer: chords.json and localStorage hooks
Implement new song initialization flow
description: UX gap discovered in testing. Currently adding progressions appends to whatever activeSong exists (defaults to STAY from chords.json). Need a clear "start fresh" action that resets to an empty song structure.
design:
Options:
1. "NEW SONG +" button resets activeSong to empty template
2. First add from artist library prompts "Add to current or start new?"
3. Dashboard "Resume" vs "New Session" distinction
acceptance_criteria:
- Clear way to start a fresh/empty song
- Adding first progression doesn't mix with previous session data
- User understands when they're building on existing vs starting fresh

title: Sync songKey state when song prop changes
description: ActivePlayingView.tsx:37 initializes songKey with useState but never resyncs when a different song is loaded. Roman numerals and key display will be wrong after loading a saved song with a different key.
design: Add useEffect to resync songKey when song.id changes. Also reset transpose and selectedChord to defaults.
acceptance_criteria:
- Loading saved song with key "G MAJOR" displays correct key in selector
- Roman numerals update to reflect loaded song's key
- Transpose resets to 0 on song change
- Selected chord resets to first chord

title: Update activeSong after save overlay title change
description: SaveOverlay saves new title to localStorage but activeSong state in App.tsx isn't updated. Header shows stale title until reload.
design: Modify onSave flow: either have saveSong return the updated song and update activeSong in App.tsx, or pass setActiveSong to ActivePlayingView.
acceptance_criteria: - Change title in save overlay -> header immediately shows new title\n- No reload required to see updated title

title: Section filter should match prefix not exact
description: SavedSongs.tsx:62 uses exact match for section filters. Songs with sections like "VERSE 1" or "VERSE_01" won't match the VERSE filter.
design: Change filter logic to use case-insensitive startsWith: s.name.toUpperCase().startsWith(filter)
acceptance_criteria: - Song with "VERSE 1" section matches VERSE filter\n- Song with "Chorus" section matches CHORUS filter\n- Case insensitive matching works

title: Update stale documentation to reflect shipped behavior
description: feature-dev-docs/feature-dev-init/requirements.md and tests.md list items as missing that are now implemented. Also project-spec.md and feature-dev-docs/ are untracked in git.
design: Update requirements.md and tests.md to reflect current state. Stage and commit documentation files.
acceptance_criteria: - requirements.md reflects actual implemented behavior\n- tests.md acceptance criteria match reality\n- All doc files tracked in git
